New Records: Tyler Herro scored a career-high 32 points with five 3-pointers and four assists.
Bam Adebayo recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 10 assists, and 9 rebounds.
The Miami Heat achieved a 17-point lead before the Pelicans closed the gap.
Key Match Events: The Heat expanded their lead to 17 points before the Pelicans' late surge.
Trey Murphy III's 34 points were a turning point for the Pelicans, bringing them within six points.
Nikola Jovic's buzzer-beater gave the Heat a 36-24 lead at the end of the first quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans suffered their 11th straight loss and 20th defeat in 21 games.
The game was highlighted by the Heat's home performance and the Pelicans' struggles.
Others: Terry Rozier served a one-game suspension for his role in a skirmish.
The Heat's victory marked Jimmy Butler's return from a five-game absence due to illness.
